name: 2 Pics 1 Mix
description:
2 pics 1 mix !
The rules are simple!
2 images, and you have to find the perfect mix.
Warning: Extremely addictive!

Find out why everyone loves this game and JOIN THE FUN NOW!

*ENDLESS FUN WITH NEW PUZZLES!*
Can you guess the pix and unlock the levels?

*PURE, INSTANT FUN*
No registration, no complicated rules.
Just start playing and have fun!

*SIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY*
Which word are we looking for? The mix of the 2 pics.
